Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are promising devices for electrical power generation from hydrogen or hydrocarbon fuels.
Titulo: CaO-SiO2-B2O3 Glass as a Sealant for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The paper reports our study of CaO-SiO2-B2O3 material with composition 36 mol.% SiO2, 26 mol.% B2O3, and 38 mol.% CaO as a high-temperature sealant for SOFCs with an operating temperature of 850 degrees C.
Titulo: CaO-SiO2-B2O3 Glass as a Sealant for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The material was studied as an alternative to presently existing commercial glass and glass-ceramics sealants for SOFCs with operating temperature of 850 degrees C. Many of these sealants have limited adhesion to the surface of Crofer 22APU steel, commonly used in these SOFCs.
Titulo: CaO-SiO2-B2O3 Glass as a Sealant for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The present study included X-ray diffraction, dilatometric, thermal, and microstructural analysis The study has shown that the softening point of the CaO-SiO2-B2O3 glass is around 900 degrees C, allowing sealing of the SOFCs with this glass at convenient temperature of 925 degrees C.
Titulo: CaO-SiO2-B2O3 Glass as a Sealant for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The CaO-SiO2-B2O3 glass sealant has shown excellent adhesion to the surface of Crofer 22APU steel; SEM images demonstrated evidences of chemical reaction and formation of strong interface on sealant-steel contact surface.
Titulo: CaO-SiO2-B2O3 Glass as a Sealant for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the glass has shown a coefficient of thermal expansion about 8.4 x 10(-6)
Titulo: CaO-SiO2-B2O3 Glass as a Sealant for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: 1/K after sealing, making it thermomechanically compatible with the existing SOFC materials.
Titulo: CaO-SiO2-B2O3 Glass as a Sealant for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
